reviewText: I just wish they had talked more about his actual life instead of just career. But still, entertaining and informative, nonetheless. A must-see for all film buffs.
I've always been a Chaplin fan and this biography of his life will tell you everything you need to know about the man.
i've been looking for a copy of this for years (at a lower price) and was very happy to find this.  thank you for the service.
My daughter loves all of Charlie Chaplin movies. She enjoyed watching the collection and would recommend this collection to all that enjoy having laughs and enjoy Charlie Chaplin

Absolutely superb!

Smartly written, excellent source material, great interviews and charming color home movies (showing a still spry Chaplin in the 1960s playing around for the camera).

This is, by far, the best Chaplin documentary ever produced, and one of the best documentaries of ANY kind that I have ever seen.

You will not be disappointed.

This would be a great introduction to Charlie Chaplin.  I decided to start wiht the Robert Downey Jr. film, "Chaplin."  That was a bad move on my part.  This came in a box set called "the chaplin collection."  It is a great film narrated by Sydney Pollack.  Great interviews with family members, friends, and footage from the most famous Chaplin films.  Buy this, you will not regret it.
